short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Remind yourself on a daily basis of all the good things which have happened to you and for what you are truly grateful for.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Tough day at work?

Tough day at home?

A lot of the time, it can feel like the negativity is overwhelming. 

As we go through the grind of the day, it's easy to get caught up in the routine and forget to appreciate what we already have.

The Regrateful Jar is a constant reminder of your blessings and a way to fully engage in life by being grateful.

Our jar collects meaningful things every time you hit a bump, so you can be reminded of all the good vibes you're surrounded with. Enter magical moments you are grateful for on a weekly or adhoc basis and get reminded of these every time you logon in the morning.
